name: Whispering-Gallery Wave (Snowfall)
description:
'Whispering-Gallery Wave' is an impromptu installation and non-human performance using magnetic tape to translate the movements of air; in realtime. 

The only editing to this video documentation is at the midpoint, with reversal of film to create a loop and the blurring of audio. Created in Parc-Extension, Montréal Canada.

Medium: Magnetic Tape, Wind | 1080px x 1920px - 3 minutes 24 seconds MP4 (SOUND/HEADPHONES) | Ryan Thompson, February 2022 | @RT_Artwork | www.ryanthompson.name
